title: (x) 'cog': Old Style Serif face - Warnock {Stephen}
content:
Hi, guys! Any idea on this old style serif font? I kinda fancy it, but didn't have any luck finding it. I've come close with ITC Stone Serif ( [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-stone-serif/stone-serif-medium/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015220205/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-stone-serif/stone-serif-medium/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-stone-serif/stone-serif-medium/")), but that's all.

comments.content: Sorry about that. I seem to have messed up the attachment process.
